scripts.start: npm run start:portal & npm run start:react16 & npm run start:react15 & npm run start:vue
scripts.install:all: cd portal && npm i --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org && cd ../react16 && npm i --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org && cd ../react15 && npm i --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org && cd ../vue && npm i --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org
